metadata.title: CVE-2017-17664 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A Remote Crash issue was discovered in Asterisk Open Source 13.x before 13.18.4, 14.x before 14.7.4, and 15.x before 15.1.4 and Certified Asterisk before 13.13-cert9. Certain compound RTCP packets cause a crash in the RTCP Stack.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:13.22.0~dfsg-2').
